all i can say is "wow" and domo arigato!!! and i was very impressed with te 
rsponse i have, now i have all this options to track down. btw, i have read 
"Musuis story" and in my opinion if ur after a sword and honor storyline  
then this book is not for u, BUT if ur after a historical point of view of 
the people during the Tokugawa Great peace then this book will be a good read 
for historical information.And Warlord, i just wanna tell u that ive always 
wanted to start my own collection of authentic samurai swords and armor, 
problem is im still in college and short on cash, but someday i hope to 
collect and start this hobby,any tips for a newbie like me on how to get 
started and not getting rip off on his first try,as always any info long or 
short would be greatly appreciates, once again domo arigato warlord. Appare 
chushin!
